page.title: 15COMMUTING TO WORK
page.content: There is very little work in the area so most people must work elsewhere. Pickford Builders are the only builders in the area.They have a yard in Great Easton.We made a count of all the parents who work in and out of the area. _______________________________ Miles Home 0-5 5-10 13-15 _______________________________ Dads 10 5 2 12 _______________________________ Mums 19 14 1 1 _______________________________ We went around our school and asked the children what their dads do at work.One of them works for the Queen. He is a special detective.One of them is an Anglian waterman.Most of the people who commute to work,work in either London, Bishop's Stortford or Dunmow.
